answers.answer: Stairs? Squats? Don't do those without someone around, I'm 29 weeks and if I squat... Let's say I did squat down forgetting I shouldn't and well I know I won't have a problem going into labor.

Drink ginger tea as much as you can I've heard and did it with my first child that it helps dilate also the milk and orange drink i haven't done it but heard stories of it actually working. Walking, stairs, squats, and also try to have sex when hubby gets back.
Well I have done stair s , literally running them and nothing,  squats as well, ... all I have left is teas which im walking to the store to get will come out to 4 miles..
Why cant you be induced? I had gd and I was induced with my son. He was born within five hrs. 9 pounds 2 oz...

question: I cant be induced cause I have gestational diabetes and they are gonna do c section dec 23but I really don't want it.. my doctor said I can go natural before than and have tried everything except for sex (hubby is out of town) and teas tp try to get labor started. . Yesterday I walked 2miles and nothing ; (.. what should I do :/
title: 37 weeks & 5days ready to see my baby girl
